# Government Tender Agreement
## Technical Translation Services in Atlantic Canada

### Solicitation Number
AR22SOA-79264

### Publication Date
2022-12-07

### Tender Closing Date
2023-01-17T14:00:00 (Closed)

### Duration of Contract

The contract will be for a period of one (1) year with a maximum estimated value of $330,000.00.

### Background
Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites proposals from consulting firms for a Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) to provide technical translation services for the Department of National Defence (DND). The translation services will support various locations in Atlantic Canada, including the Canadian Forces Base Halifax, 14 Wing Greenwood, 9 Wing Gander, 5 Wing Goose Bay, and CFB Gagetown.

### Evaluation Criteria
Proposals will be evaluated based on established criteria.

### Scope of Work
The successful contractor will provide translation services for technical documents as required by DND. Call-ups under the SOA will be valued between $1,000.00 and $40,000.00.

### Tender Requirements
The tender process is open to all qualified consulting firms. The contract award will be based on the evaluation results.

### Additional Information
The RFP document contains further details about the contract. Firms interested in this opportunity can submit their proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System.

### Contact Information
For more information, please contact:
* Mark Smith
* Email: [mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 613-859-0549

### Trade Agreements
This tender opportunity is covered under the following trade agreements:
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) / Accord sur les marchés publics de l'Organisation mondiale du commerce (AMP-OMC)
